about_the_game:
Amber City is a puzzle game. Enter the game and the girl in the white dress wakes up in a broken city. She uses the light in her hands to light the mysterious cocoon, turn back the clock, repair the city, and restore the city to its once prosperous years.

GamePlay

- Unique puzzle play: count the amount of light, plan the movement path, find a way to light the cocoon, repair the city.
- Puzzle solving with increasing dimensions: As the game progresses, you encounter "companions" and "enemies". Synchronous robots will follow your instructions and solve puzzles together; Enemy droids, on the other hand, require careful avoidance or control. In the middle of the game, your light control will increase and you will encounter different colors of light, opening up a new light transmission experience.
- Extensive game content: 9 chapters with over 70 well-designed levels and over 30 unique mechanics or elements.
- Exquisite 2D hand-painted scenes: Hand-painted scenes connect with each other to form a fine and complete broken city. As the puzzle moves forward, the shattered city will flourish again.
- Beautiful music: soft and delicate music creates a fresh and soothing environment for puzzle solving.
- Challenge for puzzle aficionados: collect special "cores", complete the level in the minimum number of steps, and challenge the golden rating
